title: Erdős Problem #31
description: Given any infinite set ... there is a set ... of density ... such that ... contains all except finitely many integers. Conjectured by Erdős and Straus. Proved by Lorentz [Lo54]. View the LaTeX source

overview.problemStatement: Given any infinite set $A\subset \mathbb{N}$ there is a set $B$ of density $0$ such that $A+B$ contains all except finitely many integers. Conjectured by Erdős and Straus. Proved by Lorentz [Lo54]. View the LaTeX source
